Package imagingbook.pub.corners

Class HarrisCornerDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.corners.GradientCornerDetector
      • imagingbook.pub.corners.HarrisCornerDetector
  • public class HarrisCornerDetector
extends GradientCornerDetector
    This is an implementation of the Harris corner detector, as described in
    C. G. Harris and M. Stephens. A combined corner and edge detector. In C. J. Taylor, editor, 4th Alvey Vision Conference, pp. 147â€“151, Manchester (1988).
    This class extends GradientCornerDetector (where most of the work is done) by defining a specific corner score function and associated threshold.
    Version:
    2021/10/08

    • Method Detail

      • getCornerScore

        protected float getCornerScore​(float a,
                               float b,
                               float c)
        Description copied from class: GradientCornerDetector
        Calculates the corner response score for a single image position (u,v) from the elements A, B, C of the local structure matrix. To be implemented by concrete sub-classes.
        Specified by:
        getCornerScore in class GradientCornerDetector
        Parameters:
        a - = Ixx(u,v)
        b - = Iyy(u,v)
        c - = Ixy(u,v)
        Returns:
        the corner score
        See Also:
        HarrisCornerDetector, ShiTomasiDetector
